Articles.Content:
I'm a big fan of the excellent work /u/nyrath has done on the Orion mod (for those not familiar with it, Orion was crazy idea someone in the US military had about powering spacecraft with nuclear bombs). I also wanted to do something a bit different from just putting a lander or small rover on another body, so decided to run an entire space program around sending some colonists to Laythe, with an airship. Originally, the plan was to send a single vessel out there, then potentially fly it back (there's never a shortage of dV with Orion, just the minor issue of vessels being so heavy they are nigh-impossible to turn) to pick up more gear. Eventually, this morphed into developing a small fleet, and flying the whole lot out there in one transfer window.
